scripts.say: Haah... I wonder what Indy is doing right now~
I wonder if she's eating and sleeping well, and brushing her teeth on time every day~
Ah! What if she's getting bullied because she's the quiet type?!
You're worrying too much... For how much you dote on her, you really ought to believe in her a bit more. She's not that weak, you know.
Ahh!! Does that mean she's grown up enough to fly away on her own? Indy, don't leave meee! Stay with your big sister forever~!
That's not even what I said... Ah, forget it. Every time I'm around you, I can't seem to stay serious... Portland, do you not get nervous at all?
Nervous? Sure I am. It's extremely important for us to maintain control of this strategic naval route. Even I understand that much.
Only by controlling this island and its surrounding waters can we ensure the safety of our supply lines and the establishment of our forward operating base.
We can't let this place fall no matter what, so of course I am nervous.
Words of such logic and clarity are flowing from Portland's mouth... pinch me...
But! In the face of my love for Indy, such nervousness is nothing more than dust in the wind!
Sigh... I thought you'd say that sooner or later...
Hehehe, my love for Indy is boundless!
Yes, yes. Boundless indeed. Let's keep moving forward - we're already approaching our target.
